findings.issue: Complete absence of Phase 1 implementation - no actual code changes made
findings.impact: Zero progress on main deliverables specified in implementation plans
findings.fix: Implement the 4 new files as specified in implementation plan: statistical_utils.py, random_noise_baseline.py, phase1_configs.py, phase1_statistical_viability.py

findings.issue: Critical path bug NOT fixed - still has hardcoded 'model-20.pt' paths
findings.impact: Plan identified this as causing 98% failure rates, blocking all Phase 1 statistical testing
findings.fix: Replace hardcoded 'model-20.pt' with dynamic calculation: f'model-{TRAIN_ITERATIONS // 1000}.pt'

findings.issue: Extensive lint/formatting violations across codebase (500+ issues)
findings.fix: Run automated formatter (black/autopep8) and fix imports organization

findings.issue: Unused imports and variables (F401, F841 violations)
findings.fix: Remove unused imports and variables identified by flake8

plan_assessment.note: Only review tracking files were modified - no actual implementation occurred
